name: driftwood
text: I wish this would happen to me someday.

name: linning
text:
I once saw my friends car parked a block from my house when coming back from university one afternoon. Knowing he was a fan of achewood, I ran home, used photoshop to extend the last strip into a regular-size ticket, then put it under his wiper.

To this day I deny that it was me.

name: linning
text:
Everyone should do this at college campuses and the like worldwide.

It would be a good guerilla marketing campaign to start up for the launch of the GOF book.

Seriously. This could be a thing.

name: bixschmix
text: You are a good friend. I wish I had a friend like you to do a thing like that.

name: dj_douche
text: A comment left by dj_douche was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by re5urgam, kalensc, morbo)

name: mollywap
text: no you didn't

name: deimosrising
text: Squirrel police are way cooler than real ones

name: norrin
text: I think they just run around getting drunk and checking out people's cars.

name: sexualhomeboy
text: A comment left by sexualhomeboy was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, Vondicus, dizneedave, HSE, robbingdog, Talbain, zeromyerz, retinarow, VictoriaW, I_Love_Kate)

name: luckypyjamas
text: whaddaya mean, "real" cops? are you some kind of jerk or something?

name: snowman
text: this deserves more chubs

name: perhapsmaybe
text: it would make someone's day to have this on their car

name: suprememongoose
text: I want to make these and distribute them.

name: lizjones
text: Too bad Todd can't read.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: more tickets need to be notices of how frikking awesome a car is.

name: thommy_h
text: How did the officer expect to recieve a reply?

name: ntopp
text: Well, you gotta figure it has his badge number and a court date on there. Court date's gotta be worth some free beer, at least .

name: aperson
text: The fricken awesomest bit is: no question mark on the officer's comment.

name: flynn
text: A comment left by flynn was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by FuckYou, Ravenmancer, tetrisattack, boswelljn)

name: 1000hz
text: Squirrels are the best things.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "WE ARE LOOKING FOR SOMEONE NEW TO WRITE THE ALT TEXT BECAUSE THE LAST GUY QUIT. SEND RESUMES TO CHRIS AT ACHEWOOD.COM"

name: fox
text: what qualifies yout o write alt text?  I'm thinking of going into the field.

name: geysershitdick
text: You have at least a Master's in English Literature, right?

name: cbtbone
text: And three years' related experience?  With references?

name: spectre
text: Poor Teodor, passed out at the bar.

name: cdl146
text: A friend of mine actually made some of these and distributed them around town.

name: ntopp
text: And how'd that work out?

name: afronaut
text: Is it weird that i only just noticed that Blister's arms are ALWAYS like that?

name: boswelljn
text: wow

name: peterjoel
text: shit, yeah. Even when he isn't talking...

name: dasilodavi
text: I don't think the cop will be too jazzed when he finds out that suckin' dick paid for this van.

name: envika
text: that's WHY it's frikkin awesome.

name: rateoforange
text: I don't think the squirrel police are going to buy the van origin myth. Todd's in trouble.

name: tekende
text: The Squirrel Police have given out 37,852 notices to frikking awesome cars.

name: buttermoths
text: All this talk of 'Squirrel Police' has lodged 'Jazz Police' by Leonard Cohen in my brain, with a slight change in the lyrics.

name: buttermoths
text: ...naturally, it's all sung in 'Alvin & The Chipmunks'-style, and it's the death of God.

name: balikye
text: Okay guys I've had this sitting on my computer for six months now: [IMGS OFF]

name: jujubeesforjesus
text:
I have this conversation all the time:
"Wanna take?"
...
"What?"
"Wanna take?"
Look which informs me that they don't think im of high mind.
"...take off? Wanna leave?"
"Ooooh. Uh...I dunno."

name: cyberia
text: I wish I got parking tickets like this

name: rasteroid
text:
I have to stop being able to read this strip, read the punchline, and enjoy it. It seems so limiting, but this really is one of the funniest comics ever created.

It's PERFECT. ACK.

Long time reader, first comment ever! Peace yo!

name: mikeronomicon
text: I wonder if the squirrel fuzz noticed the licence plate holder?

name: mashuren
text: This reminds me of a Toothpaste For Dinner strip.

name: sabbac
text: It's my firm belief that Todd somehow wrote that ticket out himself

name: lucid
text:
I always assumed it was Blister. Maybe it's his all caps no punctuation speaking manner and his lack of alternating stances, but I felt like he was feigning surprise at Todd having received a ticket, particuarly because he asks "What's it say?" rather than "What for?".

But on the first reading I didn't notice the squirrel police department and the thought of squirrel polie hadn't crossed my mind.

name: origotoshi
text: Sooo... How did the van go from apparently being inside in the last strip, to outside in this one? I mean, there were just working on it, decided to leave, and walked outside to the van...
